body.name: Microsoft XBOX 360 Kinect Sensor
body.stockDetail: Only 18 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 22 mins
features: Does not come with the power cable needed for the original Xbox 360
body.description: Kinect brings games and entertainment to life in extraordinary new ways – no controller required. Easy to use and instantly fun, Kinect gets everyone off the couch moving, laughing, and cheering. See a ball? Kick it. Control an HD movie with a wave of the hand. Want to join a friend in the fun? Simply jump in. With Kinect, technology evaporates, letting the natural magic in all of us shine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good, fast delivered

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its a good product. 5/5... for now.
reviews.reviewText: it was a great purchase. remember there are different sellers. there is a small scratch but its fine. the description of the product states that there is NOT an adapter for pc/og xbox 360.no cable damage and everything else is fine. i have not been able to use it because the adapter has not arrived yet. i will update my review when i can test it.UPDATE:Tested it and works like a charm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Fast delivery! I ordered a Kinect. It works well and I paid less compared to what others were selling it for. Please be advised....It does not come with adapter. I was aware of it by reading the reviews so I bought an adapter before ordering. I was prepared. 👍🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I got a Kinect in very good shape, hardly any wear on it at all ...
reviews.reviewText: I understood from the reviews that it was a gamble buying this, but for the price I figured it was worth it and it was. I got a Kinect in very good shape, hardly any wear on it at all and it works just fine. It didn't come with the AC-powered USB adaptor I would need to hook it up to my big old 360, but it didn't claim it would and that was easy enough to order and not too expensive. I gambled and won. It works great and all old was under $40.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SupremeDealsCR...Fantastic customer support
reviews.reviewText: First, I would like to say that with 36 years of IT experience, I understand that things happen. Now to the review...I received the sensor from SupremeDealsCR and hooked it up. It worked for about 7 hours and then died. Some troubleshooting indicated that the sensor camera had stopped working. Per the enclosed documentation, I contacted Max at SupremeDealsCR rather than contacting Amazon. All I can say is SupremeDealsCR has amazing customer support. I had very fast and positive interaction with them and they quickly sent me a replacement sensor (2 days). I ran the sensor for about 12 hours incident free. Max contacted me the following day with a follow-up to ensure that everything was functioning properly and that I was happy with the support. Thank you Max and SupremeDealsCR! It is rare to find such fantastic customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coolest thing he didn't even know he wanted.
reviews.reviewText: I haven't played with this much as it was a Christmas gift for my 17 year old son.I have heard my wife and him in giggling and laughing while playing games with it though and he has repeatedly stated how it is the coolest thing that he didn't even know he wanted.It allows for voice commands to the XBox and I hear him telling the XBox to do things all the time. Its usually the first thing he shows off to his friends when they come over.This one was refurbished and so far it has worked flawlessly. It was a great buy for the kid that has everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not work
reviews.reviewText: The sensor would turn on and the light was green, but when I went to play a game the kinect sensor would not register. The Kinect sensor would point to the ground, the light changed to an orange-red color and the game shut down due to the device not working. It did have a couple of scratches but nothing signifying that the device itself was inoperable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kinect Refurb is Great!
reviews.reviewText: I just got my Kinect refurb yesterday! I am unable to tell the difference from this and a NEW product. The condition is excellent and everything comes factory packaged with new manuals and inserts. The Kinect even had factory stickers on it. Everything that is included with the NEW one is included with this. I have one of the first Xbox 360's and it works perfectly with the included equipment.
Funcionando perfeitamenteChegou antes do prazoRecomendo o vendedor
Entrega rápida; Veio bem embalado; qualidade e conservação dentro do esperado. Tudo certo!
